chargeHist.descr: Possess Drug Paraphernalia to Manufacture, Compound, Convert, Produce, or Store Methamphetamine

result.execSummary:
The defendant Erik Black was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of Methamphetamine [Modifiers: Repeater], a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(g).
  • Bail Jumping-Felony, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(b).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Erik Black
Current: 206 N 7th St, Wausau, WI 54403 United States  (Effective: 11-13-2017)
Prior: 500 Forest St, c/o Marathon Co Jail, Wausau, WI 54403 United States
w/Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief

Clerk: Kimberly
Case Called: 3:41pm
State appears by ADA Kyle Mayo, deft appears in person/in custody with Atty John Wallace III

PRELIMINARY HEARING:
Waiver of Prelim. filed.  
Court questions deft as to waiver.
Court finds waiver freely and voluntarily made.
COURT finds PC - Defendant bound over for arraignment & trial.  
Information filed.  Reading Waived.
Plea: NOT GUILTY

Bond:  Continued

Plea hearing: 
Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights & Counsel filed. State moves: 
Ct 1 Burglaray-Building or Dwelling- Repeater >> D&RI 
Ct 3 Bail Jumping- Felony- Repeater >> delete "repeater" enhancer
Ct 4 Possess Drug Paraphernalia to Manufacture, Compound, Convert, Produce, or Store Methamphetamine- Repeater >> D&RI
COURT grants above

PLEA: 
Ct 2 Possession of Methamphetamine- Repeater >> NO CONTEST
Ct 3 Bail Jumping- Felony >> NO CONTEST

COURT advises def of rights & penalties & ques def to understanding.  Crt finds plea & waiver freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty.  

COURT ORDERS: 
Ct 2 Possession of Methamphetamine- Repeater >> 
4 years WSPS, 2 years IC, 2 years ES, concurrent to any sentence currently being served and Ct 3.
Conditions: assessment/treatment/counseling, AODA and follow up, GFE to maintain full time work/full time school, absolute sobriety from drugs, court costs, DNA sample and surcharge. Court finds 121 days credit. Eligible for programming immediately.

Ct 3 Bail Jumping- Felony >> 4 years WSPS, 2 years IC, 2 years ES, concurrent to any sentence currently being served and Ct 2.
Conditions: assessment/treatment/counseling, AODA and follow up, GFE to maintain full time work/full time school, absolute sobriety from drugs, court costs, DNA sample and surcharge. Court finds 121 days credit. Eligible for programming immediately.
